subject: AI & Agents
title: Chatbots and Conversational AI
description: A micro-lesson that makes Chatbots and Conversational AI usable.

hook.text: You message customer support. The 'agent' replies in 2 seconds. It's not human.

buildup.text: Conversational AI uses LLMs to maintain multi-turn dialogues with context memory.

discovery.text: System prompts define personality, boundaries, and domain knowledge for the chatbot.

twist.text: Memory management is key: too much history overflows context, too little loses coherence.

climax.text: Handoff to humans when confidence is lowâ€”the bot should know when it doesn't know.

punchline.text: Talk to a model. Get real answers. Escalate when needed.

quiz.question: What should a chatbot do when uncertain?
